name: International Student Conference On Asia Africa Studies
content: 2nd International Student Conference on Asia-Africa Studies (ISCAAS) is the 2nd undergraduate conference and is a part of International Economics Student of Competitions (IESC) held by Student Organization of Economics and Development Studies, Padjadjaran University, Bandung, Indonesia. The mission of this event is to facilitate discussion and encourage participants to deliver ideas and propose solution as their contibution to aware on economic development condition. Partial development is one of the main issues in developing countries. High income and economic inequality in developing countries especially in Asia and Africa regions is indication of partial development. Equitable development requires sustainable and extensive development. Given this condition, International Student Conference on Asia-Africa Studies (ISCAAS) invites all undergraduate students from all over the world especially Asia and Africa universities to propose the ideas in this conference.
